name: Escape from Yourself
description:
Hi, I'm an italian 15 y.o. developer. This game is made for the Brackeys game jam, I hope you'll like it. Everything is made by me (font, assets, music, etc. )

WebGL version has some graphical bugs, I reccomend the windows version. (please before rating it "bad graphics" download it, I've passed hours optimizing it for windows)

In some points it's a little bit hard, but is doable. Spikes are hidden so you always have to pay attention. Try to finish it!
